title: Angelos Via Napoli
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Italian food and pizzeria. Pizza and bread is made in-house and vegan suitable. Larger groups could pre-order 1-week ahead for vegan cheese. The barilla-pasta (including the lasagna) is not vegan, the pasta made of spelt is vegan and gluten-free. Tuesday "poveri" bargain special pizza (margherita, funghi) after 5pm. Thursday "pazzo" bargain special pasta after 5pm.
